objects.name: appmgmt.dll
objects.description: Turian malware recently found in our telemetry from October 2023 that we believe is from the threat actor Playful Taurus.

objects.name: update.adobeonline.net
objects.description: Domain used by threat actor Playful Taurus as early as 2022-07-19.

objects.name: update.adboeonline.net
objects.description: Misspelled domain that uses adboeonline instead of adobeonline. Seen in configuration of two Turian malware samples from 2022 used by threat actor Playful Taurus. Later registered by what we believe is likely a different threat actor.
